comments.html: Nice article! You can basically copy / paste the commands from your sheet to implement MPLS TE (the name sounds so SCI-FI :) )

comments.html:
Nice sheet!
Seeing IS-IS in the cheatsheet remind me the RFC5310 (IS-IS Generic Cryptographic Authentication) released today.
Finally no excuse with IS-IS basic authentication less collision target than MD5 :>

Best regards
